thread.title: Ameriana shareholders set to vote on merger
thread.title_full: Ameriana shareholders set to vote on merger

author: (IBJ Staff)
title: Ameriana shareholders set to vote on merger
text:
Home » Ameriana shareholders set to vote on merger Ameriana shareholders set to vote on merger October 17, 2015 Monitoring: Keeping Your Finger on the Pulse of School Improvement 
Shareholders of Ameriana Bancorp are scheduled to meet Dec. 7 to vote on the New Castle-based financial institution’s $69 million sale to Muncie-based First Merchants Corp. The deal, announced in June, furthers First Merchants’ strategy of expanding in central Indiana and provides a hefty premium to Ameriana shareholders. The $22.71-per-share price is 45 percent above where Ameriana’s shares were trading the day before the deal was announced. First Merchants said in a regulatory filing that it expects to reap $9.8 million in cost savings after completion of the deal.
